name: @desplega.ai/playwright-reporter
description: desplega.ai Playwright Reporter - A custom reporter for Playwright tests that integrates with the desplega.ai platform.

scripts.build: bun build lib/src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.pw:test:shard: playwright test --shard=1/4 --output=test-results/shard-1 & playwright test --shard=2/4 --output=test-results/shard-2 & playwright test --shard=3/4 --output=test-results/shard-3 & playwright test --shard=4/4 --output=test-results/shard-4 & wait
scripts.generate-schema: ts-json-schema-generator --path lib/src/types.ts --type ReporterEvent --tsconfig tsconfig.json --expose all --jsDoc extended --strict-tuples --no-ref-encode --no-top-ref --out schemas/reporter-events.schema.json
scripts.release: bun run build && npm version patch && bun publish --access public
